name: Paul Schofield

name: George Barron
tweet: @stuartpengs @Olliecological Acres of new plantings between Ponterwd and Llangurig are in trenches cut vertically above the Wye. Forestry Com, pre 2013 decreed new planting should be in horizontal cut trench to prevent run off. This will not help water quality or ease future flooding down stream. Shambles !!
